head.title: Insert Charts in {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, developers can quickly create and embed dynamic charts into documents using live data sources.

header.title: Easily Add Charts to {{FileFormatUp}} Files Using {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} streamlines the process of integrating charts into {{FileFormatUp}} documents with real-time data input.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust solution for creating automated documents and reports. Add charts, tables, images, barcodes, and lists to files with precision and ease. This versatile platform supports over 50 formats, including PDFs, Office documents, and emails.

more_features.title: Embed Charts Effortlessly in Your Documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} makes it simple to generate feature-rich documents in popular file types. Use templates to add charts, tables, barcodes, lists, images, and more with real-time data updates.

feature_1.title: Transform Data into Professional Charts
feature_1.content: Convert data from sources like JSON, XML, or CSV into high-quality charts that can be directly embedded into documents.

feature_2.title: Create Stunning Visuals
feature_2.content: Generate bar charts, pie graphs, and line charts that work seamlessly with other document elements like images, tables, and barcodes.

feature_3.title: Flexible Chart Styling and Placement
feature_3.content: Use LINQ templates to control chart positioning and styling, including colors, layouts, and labels, for a polished presentation.

feature_4.title: Supports Many File Formats
feature_4.content: Generate documents in formats like MS Office, PDF, OpenOffice, and HTML, with charts perfectly integrated for a professional finish.

formats.title: Generate Reports in Multiple File Formats
formats.description: {{EnvName}} supports over 50 formats, making it easy to combine templates with data to produce polished documents.

operations.title: Discover Advanced Features
operations.description: This platform simplifies document creation with tools designed for data visualization and seamless integration.

examples.comment_1: Include this tag in your template to generate a chart
examples.comment_3: Extract data from your source system
examples.comment_4: Save the final document with the embedded chart

steps.title: Steps to Add a Chart to a {{FileFormatUp}} Document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes adding charts to {{FileFormatUp}} files easy. Choose from chart types like bar, line, or pie charts.
content.step_1: Design a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for charts.
content.step_2: Load data from a supported source.
content.step_3: Configure chart options, including type, colors, and labels.
content.step_4: Export the document with the embedded chart.

code_1.title: Dynamically Generate and Insert Charts
code_1.content: This example illustrates how to create and embed charts into {{FileFormatUp}} files programmatically.
code_1.comment_1: Set up a template with a placeholder for the chart
code_1.comment_2: Define the path to the template file
code_1.comment_3: Retrieve data from a chosen source
code_1.comment_4: Prepare a data object containing the chart information
code_1.comment_5: Choose the chart type and customize its appearance
code_1.comment_7: Save the updated document with the chart embedded

texts_pdf.step_1: Create a template with placeholders for charts (PDF templates are unsupported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Save the document with the chart as a PDF file.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: Note: PDF templates are not currently supported.
